paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. I will praise the Lord with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.

paragraphs.content: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The works of the Lord are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.

paragraphs.content: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.

paragraphs.content: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the Lord is gracious and full of compassion.

paragraphs.content: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.

paragraphs.content: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.

paragraphs.content: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.

paragraphs.content: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.

paragraphs.content: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.

paragraphs.content: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
